column2: What is "FM"
column5: FM is a short term of Freshmen, means a student in the first year of college

column2: When will the schedule swap exercise hold
column5: It depands, last year was 3 Sep 4:30 pm. Please check Learner Portal for the latest info

column2: Where is Dominic?s temple
column5: The college staff room is located at 12-13 Floor of KEC Center

column2: Where can I find Dominic Cheng
column5: The college staff room is located at 12-13 Floor of KEC Center

column2: When can I swap my timetable
column5: Usually will be the first week of new semester.Please check Learner Portal for the latest info

column2: How many lessons I can have within a day
column5: The school didn't state it but no more than 3 consecutive lessons should be fine

column2: Where can I insert LAN at the college
column5: We can find a few in common room at 3/F, but the college have provided WiFi for all student who studies in HKUSpace

column2: What is the Student representative for
column5:
1. To attend the HD Class Representative Meeting twice a year.
2. To act as a bridge between the College and the fellow classmates by collecting comments from and
conveying messages to the classmates as well as reflecting their opinions to the College in relation
to teaching, learning and support services.
3. The term of service is one academic year, i.e. academic year 2019/20

column2: How to apply for Student Representative
column5: Student have to fill in a form and submit it to the college office. Notice that there will be only one representative per course

column2: The add-drop period starts from when
column5: Please check Learner Portal for the latest info

column2: Do I need a laptop with tons of storage
column5: It depends on personal needs

column2: May I ask is there any class on Sunday
column5: Nope. Classes will only held on Mon to Sat

column2: Do we need to come back to school before 9/9
column5: Please check the school calendar

column2: Do we have Saturday class for every student
column5: For some courses, lectures will only held on Saturday. For most of the courses you can swap on our system

column2: Where to view my timetable tomorrow
column5: We can check our timetable on the Score system

column2: Is that normal that I can't check my time table now
column5: Please refer to the lastest notice form school

column2: Is it easier to successfully swap my class when I do it earlier
column5: Each course have a limited quota. The anser is Yessssss

column2: Can I start swap class at 9/9 midnight
column5: The time of swapping class will start at morning, usually will be 8:30 am

column2: Is there any class we can swap
column5: All lesson can be swap unless that is one class only

column2: Using a computer to enter the swap platform
column5: Yes, smartphone also can do

column2: Is there any limitation of swapping class
column5: 15 times of adjustment court for each course

column2: Is that means there need to have enough quota if we want to swap our class successfully
column5: Yes, every classroom will have their limition of seats

column2: What is myFuture for
column5: In this website we can apply for Reference Letter to support my University Application, apply for College Principal's Recommendation Scheme (HKU), report your University Offer and Interview Experience, course/Class Add/Drop/Swap Exercise, apply for Transcript(s) and Payment Online, destination Survey and Graduation Ceremony Registration, withdraw study from the College

column2: What is SCORE for
column5: In this website you can download unofficial transcript and check your timetable

column2: Do I have Office 365 subscription
column5: All student will have Office 365 subscription during your study period

column2: Is Johnny sir a good teacher
column5: For students who studied networking course, they clamed that Johnny is a straight lecturer who offering knowledge of networking stuff. As soon as we follows his rules

column2: Anything we need to bring at the first lesson
column5: A pen, notebook and a well prepared brain

column2: Do we need to print our own notes
column5: Usually teacher will prepared a powerpoint file for us on soul, some lecture may even print it out to us

column2: Where can i get a locker
column5: You can go to Myfuture to registration a locker

column2: Do we need to bring a laptop to the first lesson
column5: You can bring it if you really need to type ur own notes

column2: Where to go at the free time between classes
column5: Go for a lunch or coffee and sit at 3/F common room

column2: The first week won't count attendance
column5: Yes. During the add drop period, attendance will not be counted. But the lecturer will still teach their class and notes. It is better to attend lectures on time If you do not want to miss anything

column2: CIT centre is also located in Kowloonbay
column5: Yes.It is located in 63 Tai Yip Street, Kowloon Bay, Kowloon (Exit A, Kowloon Bay MTR Station)

column2: Where is IEC
column5: Island East Campus is located in 494 King?s Road, North Point, Hong Kong (Exit B3, North Point MTR Station)

column2: Where is CIT
column5: CITA Learning Centre is located in 63 Tai Yip Street, Kowloon Bay, Kowloon (Exit A, Kowloon Bay MTR Station)

column2: Where is HPSHCC
column5: HKU SPACE Po Leung Kuk Stanley Ho Community College (HPSHCC) Campus is located in 66 Leighton Road, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong

column2: Where is ULC
column5: United Learning Centre is located in 6/F & 34/F, United Centre, 95 Queensway, Hong Kong (Exit D, Admiralty MTR Station)

column2: Where is ALC
column5: Admiralty Learning Centre is located in 2/F & 3/F, Admiralty Centre, 18 Harcourt Road, Hong Kong (access via the shopping arcade escalators through Exit A, Admiralty MTR Station)

column2: Where is CLC
column5: Cyberport Learning Centre is located in Level 5, Cyberport 1, 100 Cyberport Road, Hong Kong

column2: Where is GHLC
column5: Graduate House Learning Centre is located in Level P6 (Room P601 & P602), Graduate House, No. 3 University Drive, The University of Hong Kong, Hong Kong (Exit A2, HKU MTR Station)

column2: Do we need facility card to enter library
column5: Yes, we can't enter library just using student card

column2: Is there any native speaker teaching english course
column5: Yes, there are some teacher like Mark, Daivd etc

column2: Why the 3 hours class is shown as 120 mins on swap platform
column5: It's a 120 mins class plus 10 mins for you to switch classroom

column2: Is there any power socket to charge my notebook
column5: Yes, they are all around the campus. You may find them in 3/F common room or other normal classroom

column2: Can we smoke or drink in campus
column5: We better do it outside the school after the lesson, smoke in campus area is prohibited
